comments.en:
The Minolta magicolor 2400W is a GDI color laser printer with a 2005 street price of circa $300 USD. This printer is supported by the m2300w open source printer driver.

Consumables/Refills: Toner Black (4500 prints) - $79 Toner Yellow (4500 prints) - $119 Toner Magenta (4500 prints) - $119 Toner Cyan (4500 prints) - $119 Waste Toner Box (25000 prints) - $19 OPC Drum Catridge (45000 prints) - $149 Part numbers: 1710517-005, 1710517-006, 1710517-007, 1710517-008, 1710522-001, 1710520-001
